card.name: Goz, the Coral Tyrant
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Hexproof from instants and from sorceries You may have Goz assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked. Cycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Hoofbeats in the Woods
card.text: Create a 4/4 green Elemental Elk creature token. Flashback {5}{G}, Exile two land cards from your graveyard (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Hydra Hullbreaker
card.text: Trample This creature enters with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever this creature attacks while saddled, double the number of each kind of counter on each permanent you control. Saddle 4 (Tap any number of other creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Mount becomes saddled until end of turn. Saddle only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Propagated Bioship
card.text: When this Vehicle enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Isle-Mimic Leviathan
card.text: Trample You may play lands from your graveyard and you may play an additional land each turn. Manufacture 3—{2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it as a Vehicle artifact with crew 3 and it loses all other card types. Manufacture only as a sorcery. It isn't a creature except when crewed.)

card.name: Leafwhisper Beetle
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if there are two or more land cards in your graveyard. This creature can't be blocked by more than one creature. Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, draw a card.

card.name: Lineaz Eulogist
card.text: Deathtouch When this creature enters or dies, mill three cards. When you do, you may choose a creature or land card from among the milled cards. If you chose a land card this way, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Mosstusk Guardian
card.text: Trample, ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Perennial Regrowth
card.text: When this enchantment enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal two land cards. Put those land cards onto the battlefield tapped and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Plow Through
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.) • Destroy target Vehicle.

card.name: Primordial Coelacanth
card.text: Vigilance Overwhelm — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a permanent with mana value 5 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Tin Isle Channeler

card.name: Tin Isle Lifetender
card.text: When this creature enters, create a 3/3 green Turtle creature token. Whenever you attack with this creature and a creature token, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Tin Isle Wurmrig
card.text: Creatures you control can't be blocked by creatures with flying. Whenever this Vehicle attacks, you may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield tapped. Then if it was crewed by creatures with total power 6 or greater this turn, untap each land you control. Crew 3

card.name: To the Horizon
card.text: Enchant creature or Vehicle When this Aura enters, mill three cards. You may put a creature, land, or Vehicle card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1.

card.name: Vedre Strait Caller
card.text: When this creature enters, choose one — • Choose artifact or enchantment. Each opponent sacrifices a permanent of their choice of that type. • Put a +1/+1 counter and a trample counter on target creature you control. • Put target permanent card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Vibrant Siphonophore
card.text: Ward {1} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.) Whenever a permanent you control with mana value 5 or greater enters or a creature you control matures, create a token that is a copy of this creature.

card.name: Zoophonic Call
card.text: Search your library for a creature card with mana value 5 or greater or with {X} in its cost, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Abyssal Sea-Witch
card.text: Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from your library, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Aesi, Capricious Serpent
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Trample Whenever Aesi enters or attacks, mill two cards, then you may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.

card.name: Back For More
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. When you do, it fights up to one target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Beliaz, Hot Shot
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever one or more Vehicles you control attack a player, exile the top card of each player's library. You may cast one of those cards without paying its mana cost if one of those Vehicles was crewed by a Vehicle this turn. Otherwise, you may cast one of those cards.

card.name: Grahn, Seafolk Huntmaster
card.text: Vigilance, reach, trample Grahn enters with three +1/+1 counters on him. Whenever you cast a permanent spell with mana value 5 or greater or a creature you control matures, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. If that spell or creature was legendary, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Grahn.

card.name: Cephalid Strategist
card.text: Whenever this creature becomes tapped, untap up to two target artifacts and/or creatures you control. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Apex Landshifter
card.text: Menace When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, draw two cards. When this creature dies, you may have it deal damage to target creature or planeswalker you don't control equal to the number of land cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Chordatan Bloodseeker
card.text: Menace Whenever you draw a card except the first one you draw each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Cloudbelt Synthesis
card.text: Put a flying counter on each Vehicle you control. Until end of turn, they become artifact creatures. Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Cyfra, Inktrench Tyrant
card.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell, each player mills three cards. {B}, Exile three cards from your graveyard: Cyfra gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it. {1}{U}, Exile three cards from your graveyard: Surveil 1, then draw a card.

card.name: Elagid, the Endless Glutton
card.text: Whenever you attack, you may cast a permanent spell with mana value X or less from your hand or graveyard without paying its mana cost, where X is the greatest power among attacking creatures. If you cast a spell from your graveyard this way, it enters with a finality counter on it.

card.name: Engines Critical
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a critical counter on this enchantment. When you do, choose up to one target creature you control. It gets +2/+0 for each critical counter on this enchantment and gains trample and haste until end of turn. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Eskin, Furnace Master
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you sacrificed three or more nontoken artifacts this turn, draw three cards and Eskin deals 3 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Evram, Blind Metallomancer
card.text: Menace Whenever Evram or a Vehicle she crewed this turn deals combat damage to a player, exile up to one target artifact creature or Vehicle card from your graveyard with that many repair counters on it. For as long as it remains exiled, you may cast it, and it costs {1} less to cast for each repair counter on it.

card.name: Fangworm Fleetship
card.text: Menace, haste Sacrifice another artifact: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Activate only once each turn. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Firenz, Sunvine Custodian
card.text: Each creature you control with toughness greater than its power crews Vehicles and saddles Mounts using its toughness rather than its power. Whenever Firenz becomes tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature or Vehicle you control.

card.name: Ehn, Cloud Sea Ancient
card.text: Flash This spell costs {1} less to cast for each tapped nonland permanent you control. Flying, vigilance When Ehn enters, any number of target tapped nonland permanents you control phase out.

card.name: Grandir, the Storm-Bodied
card.text: Flash You have no maximum hand size. At the beginning of your end step, draw a card for each card you discarded this turn. When you do, Grandir deals damage to any target equal to the number of cards you drew this way.

card.name: Grandir's Trove
card.text: Whenever you draw your second or fifth card each turn, put a charge counter on Grandir's Trove. {U}{U}{R}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Grandir's Trove: It deals X damage to target player and another target player draws X cards, where X is the number of charge counters on it.

card.name: Holtz, Devilish Benefactor
card.text: When Holtz enters, if he was cast, create X tapped Treasure tokens, where X is the number of artifacts and enchantments you control. Sacrifice five Treasures: Untap each creature you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

card.name: Intrepid Courier

card.name: Ka'bi, the Bloomhoof

card.text: Enchant creature or Vehicle Enchanted permanent gets +3/+2 and has menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you create a Treasure token." When enchanted permanent dies, draw a card and create a Treasure token.

card.name: Seafolk Pilgrimguard
card.text: {1}{W}, Embrace: Exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. (To embrace, tap two artifacts and/or creatures you control)

card.name: Port Patrolship
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each tapped nonland permanent you control. During your turn, this Vehicle is an artifact creature. When this Vehicle enters, scry 1, then draw a card.

card.name: Mooneye Octopus
card.text: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards. Whenever another creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Hookfin, Basalt Commander
card.text: First strike, trample, haste Whenever Hookfin attacks or becomes the target of a spell, create two Blood tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.") Creatures you control get +X/+0, where X is the number of cards you've drawn this turn.

card.name: Algal Orchard
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. {3}{G}{U}, Discard this card: Choose up to two target creatures. Until end of turn, those creatures have your choice of base power and toughness 1/1 or 4/4.

card.name: Fertile Delta
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {2}{B}{G}, Discard this card: Target permanent you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Double the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Gold Mine
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {1}{R}{W}, Discard this card: Create two Treasure tokens. If an opponent controls more lands than you, create three Treasure tokens instead.

card.name: Labor District
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {2}{W}{B}, Discard this card: It deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Elbow-Grease Innovator
card.text: Artifact creatures you control with counters on them get +2/+2. Vehicles you control have undying. (When one is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
